verses.verse: Also I in the first<WH259> year<WH8141> of Darius<WH1867> the Mede,<WH4075> even I, stood<WH5975> to confirm<WH2388> and to strengthen<WH4581> him.

And now<WH6258> will I show<WH5046> you the truth.<WH571> Behold,<WH2009> there shall stand<WH5975> up yet<WH5750> three<WH7969> kings<WH4428> in Persia;<WH6539> and the fourth<WH7243> shall be far<WH1419> richer<WH6238> than they all:<WH3605> and by his strength<WH2394> through his riches<WH6239> he shall stir<WH5782> up all<WH3605> against the realm<WH4438> of Grecia.<WH3120>
And a mighty<WH1368> king<WH4428> shall stand<WH5975> up, that shall rule<WH4910> with great<WH7227> dominion,<WH4474> and do<WH6213> according to his will.<WH7522>

And when he shall stand<WH5975> up, his kingdom<WH4438> shall be broken,<WH7665> and shall be divided<WH2673> toward the four<WH702> winds<WH7307> of heaven;<WH8064> and not to his posterity,<WH319> nor<WH3808> according to his dominion<WH4915> which<WH834> he ruled:<WH4910> for his kingdom<WH4438> shall be plucked<WH5428> up, even for others<WH312> beside<WH905> those.<WH428>

And the king<WH4428> of the south<WH5045> shall be strong,<WH2388> and one of his princes;<WH8269> and he shall be strong<WH2388> above<WH5921> him, and have dominion;<WH4910> his dominion<WH4474> shall be a great<WH7227> dominion.<WH4475>

And in the end<WH7093> of years<WH8141> they shall join<WH2266> themselves together; for the king's<WH4428> daughter<WH1323> of the south<WH5045> shall come<WH935> to the king<WH4428> of the north<WH6828> to make<WH6213> an agreement:<WH4339> but she shall not retain<WH6113> the power<WH3581> of the arm;<WH2220> neither<WH3808> shall he stand,<WH5975> nor his arm:<WH2220> but she shall be given<WH5414> up, and they that brought<WH935> her, and he that begat<WH3205> her, and he that strengthened<WH2388> her in these times.<WH6256>

But out of a branch<WH5342> of her roots<WH8328> shall one stand<WH5975> up in his estate,<WH3653> which shall come<WH935> with an army,<WH2428> and shall enter<WH935> into the fortress<WH4581> of the king<WH4428> of the north,<WH6828> and shall deal<WH6213> against them, and shall prevail:<WH2388>

And shall also<WH1571> carry<WH935> captives<WH7628> into Egypt<WH4714> their gods,<WH430> with their princes,<WH5257> and with their precious<WH2532> vessels<WH3627> of silver<WH3701> and of gold;<WH2091> and he shall continue<WH5975> more years<WH8141> than the king<WH4428> of the north.<WH6828>
So the king<WH4428> of the south<WH5045> shall come<WH935> into his kingdom,<WH4438> and shall return<WH7725> into<WH413> his own land.<WH127>

But his sons<WH1121> shall be stirred<WH1624> up, and shall assemble<WH622> a multitude<WH1995> of great<WH7227> forces:<WH2428> and one shall certainly come,<WH935> and overflow,<WH7857> and pass<WH5674> through: then shall he return,<WH7725> and be stirred<WH1624> up, even to his fortress.<WH4581>

And the king<WH4428> of the south<WH5045> shall be moved with choler,<WH4843> and shall come<WH3318> forth<WH3318> and fight<WH3898> with him, even with the king<WH4428> of the north:<WH6828> and he shall set<WH5975> forth<WH5975> a great<WH7227> multitude;<WH1995> but the multitude<WH1995> shall be given<WH5414> into his hand.<WH3027>

And when he has taken<WH5375> away the multitude,<WH1995> his heart<WH3824> shall be lifted<WH7311> up; and he shall cast<WH5307> down<WH5307> many ten<WH7239> thousands:<WH7239> but he shall not be strengthened<WH5810> by it.

For the king<WH4428> of the north<WH6828> shall return,<WH7725> and shall set<WH5975> forth a multitude<WH1995> greater<WH7227> than<WH4480> the former,<WH7223> and shall certainly come<WH935> after<WH7093> certain<WH6256> years<WH8141> with a great<WH1419> army<WH2428> and with much riches.<WH7399>

And in those<WH1992> times<WH6256> there shall many<WH7227> stand<WH5975> up against<WH5921> the king<WH4428> of the south:<WH5045> also the robbers<WH6530> of your people<WH5971> shall exalt<WH5375> themselves to establish<WH5975> the vision;<WH2377> but they shall fall.<WH3782>

So the king<WH4428> of the north<WH6828> shall come,<WH935> and cast<WH8210> up a mount,<WH5550> and take<WH3920> the most fenced<WH4013> cities:<WH5892> and the arms<WH2220> of the south<WH5045> shall not withstand,<WH5975> neither<WH369> his chosen<WH4005> people,<WH5971> neither<WH369> shall there be any strength<WH3581> to withstand.<WH5975>

But he that comes<WH935> against<WH413> him shall do<WH6213> according to his own<WH7522> will,<WH7522> and none<WH369> shall stand<WH5975> before<WH6440> him: and he shall stand<WH5975> in the glorious<WH6643> land,<WH776> which by his hand<WH3027> shall be consumed.<WH3615>

He shall also set<WH7760> his face<WH6440> to enter<WH935> with the strength<WH8633> of his whole<WH3605> kingdom,<WH4438> and upright<WH3477> ones with him; thus shall he do:<WH6213> and he shall give<WH5414> him the daughter<WH1323> of women,<WH802> corrupting<WH7843> her: but she shall not stand<WH5975> on his side, neither<WH3808> be for him.

After this shall he turn<WH7725> his face<WH6440> to the isles,<WH339> and shall take<WH3920> many:<WH7227> but a prince<WH7101> for his own behalf shall cause the reproach<WH2781> offered by him to cease;<WH7673> without<WH1115> his own reproach<WH2781> he shall cause it to turn<WH7725> on him.
Then he shall turn<WH7725> his face<WH6440> toward the fort<WH4581> of his own land:<WH776> but he shall stumble<WH3782> and fall,<WH5307> and not be found.<WH4672>

Then shall stand<WH5975> up in his estate<WH3653> a raiser<WH5674> of taxes<WH5065> in the glory<WH1925> of the kingdom:<WH4438> but within few<WH259> days<WH3117> he shall be destroyed,<WH7665> neither<WH3808> in anger,<WH639> nor<WH3808> in battle.<WH4421>

And in his estate<WH3653> shall stand<WH5975> up a vile<WH959> person, to whom<WH5921> they shall not give<WH5414> the honor<WH1935> of the kingdom:<WH4438> but he shall come<WH935> in peaceably,<WH7962> and obtain<WH2388> the kingdom<WH4438> by flatteries.<WH2519>

And with the arms<WH2220> of a flood<WH7858> shall they be overflowed<WH7857> from before<WH6440> him, and shall be broken;<WH7665> yes,<WH1571> also<WH1571> the prince<WH5057> of the covenant.<WH1285>
And after the league<WH2266> made with him he shall work<WH6213> deceitfully:<WH4820> for he shall come<WH5927> up, and shall become<WH6105> strong<WH6105> with a small<WH4592> people.<WH1471>

He shall enter<WH935> peaceably<WH7962> even on the fattest<WH4924> places of the province;<WH4082> and he shall do<WH6213> that which<WH834> his fathers<WH1> have not done,<WH6213> nor his fathers'<WH1> fathers;<WH1> he shall scatter<WH967> among them the prey,<WH961> and spoil,<WH7998> and riches:<WH7399> yes, and he shall forecast<WH2803> his devices<WH4284> against<WH5921> the strong<WH4013> holds,<WH4013> even for a time.<WH6256>

And he shall stir<WH5782> up his power<WH3581> and his courage<WH3824> against<WH5921> the king<WH4428> of the south<WH5045> with a great<WH1419> army;<WH2428> and the king<WH4428> of the south<WH5045> shall be stirred<WH1624> up to battle<WH4421> with a very<WH5704> <WH3960> great<WH1419> and mighty<WH6099> army;<WH2428> but he shall not stand:<WH5975> for they shall forecast<WH2803> devices<WH4284> against<WH5921> him.
Yes, they that feed<WH398> of the portion<WH6598> of his meat<WH6598> shall destroy<WH7665> him, and his army<WH2428> shall overflow:<WH7857> and many<WH7227> shall fall<WH5307> down slain.<WH2491>

And both<WH8147> of these kings'<WH4428> hearts<WH3824> shall be to do mischief,<WH4827> and they shall speak<WH1696> lies<WH3576> at<WH5921> one<WH259> table;<WH7979> but it shall not prosper:<WH6743> for yet<WH5750> the end<WH7093> shall be at the time appointed.<WH4150>

Then shall he return<WH7725> into his land<WH776> with great<WH1419> riches;<WH7399> and his heart<WH3824> shall be against<WH5921> the holy<WH6944> covenant;<WH1285> and he shall do<WH6213> exploits, and return<WH7725> to his own land.<WH776>
At the time appointed<WH4150> he shall return,<WH7725> and come<WH935> toward the south;<WH5045> but it shall not be as the former,<WH7223> or as the latter.<WH314>

For the ships<WH6716> of Chittim<WH3794> shall come<WH935> against him: therefore he shall be grieved,<WH3512> and return,<WH7725> and have indignation<WH2194> against<WH5921> the holy<WH6944> covenant:<WH1285> so shall he do;<WH6213> he shall even return,<WH7725> and have intelligence<WH995> with them that forsake<WH5800> the holy<WH6944> covenant.<WH1285>

And arms<WH2220> shall stand<WH5975> on his part, and they shall pollute<WH2490> the sanctuary<WH4720> of strength,<WH4581> and shall take<WH5493> away<WH5493> the daily<WH8548> sacrifice, and they shall place<WH5414> the abomination<WH8251> that makes desolate.<WH8074>

And such as do wickedly<WH7561> against the covenant<WH1285> shall he corrupt<WH2610> by flatteries:<WH2514> but the people<WH5971> that do know<WH3045> their God<WH430> shall be strong,<WH2388> and do<WH6213> exploits.

And they that understand<WH7919> among the people<WH5971> shall instruct<WH995> many:<WH7227> yet they shall fall<WH3782> by the sword,<WH2719> and by flame,<WH3852> by captivity,<WH7628> and by spoil,<WH961> many<WH7227> days.<WH3117>
Now when they shall fall,<WH3782> they shall be helped<WH5826> with a little<WH4592> help:<WH5828> but many<WH7227> shall join<WH3867> to them with flatteries.<WH2519>

And some of them of understanding<WH7919> shall fall,<WH3782> to try<WH6884> them, and to purge,<WH1305> and to make them white,<WH3835> even to the time<WH6256> of the end:<WH7093> because<WH3588> <WH5750> it is yet<WH5750> for a time appointed.<WH4150>

And the king<WH4428> shall do<WH6213> according to his will;<WH7522> and he shall exalt<WH7311> himself, and magnify<WH1431> himself above<WH5921> every<WH3605> god,<WH410> and shall speak<WH1696> marvelous<WH6381> things against<WH5921> the God<WH410> of gods,<WH410> and shall prosper<WH6743> till<WH5704> the indignation<WH2195> be accomplished:<WH3615> for that that is determined<WH2782> shall be done.<WH6213>

Neither<WH3808> shall he regard<WH995> the God<WH430> of his fathers,<WH1> nor the desire<WH2532> of women,<WH802> nor<WH3808> regard<WH995> any<WH3605> god:<WH433> for he shall magnify<WH1431> himself above<WH5921> all.<WH3605>

But in his estate<WH3653> shall he honor<WH3513> the God<WH433> of forces:<WH4581> and a god<WH433> whom<WH834> his fathers<WH1> knew<WH3045> not shall he honor<WH3513> with gold,<WH2091> and silver,<WH3701> and with precious<WH3368> stones,<WH68> and pleasant<WH2530> things.

Thus shall he do<WH6213> in the most<WH4581> strong<WH4581> holds<WH4013> with a strange<WH5236> god,<WH433> whom<WH834> he shall acknowledge<WH5234> and increase<WH7235> with glory:<WH3519> and he shall cause them to rule<WH4910> over many,<WH7227> and shall divide<WH2505> the land<WH127> for gain.<WH4242>

And at the time<WH6256> of the end<WH7093> shall the king<WH4428> of the south<WH5045> push<WH5055> at him: and the king<WH4428> of the north<WH6828> shall come<WH8175> against<WH5921> him like a whirlwind,<WH8175> with chariots,<WH7393> and with horsemen,<WH6571> and with many<WH7227> ships;<WH591> and he shall enter<WH935> into the countries,<WH776> and shall overflow<WH7857> and pass<WH5674> over.<WH5674>

He shall enter<WH935> also into the glorious<WH6643> land,<WH776> and many<WH7227> countries shall be overthrown:<WH3782> but these<WH428> shall escape<WH4422> out of his hand,<WH3027> even Edom,<WH123> and Moab,<WH4124> and the chief<WH7225> of the children<WH1121> of Ammon.<WH5983>
He shall stretch<WH7971> forth his hand<WH3027> also on the countries:<WH776> and the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714> shall not escape.<WH6413>

But he shall have power<WH4910> over the treasures<WH4362> of gold<WH2091> and of silver,<WH3701> and over all<WH3605> the precious<WH2530> things of Egypt:<WH4714> and the Libyans<WH3864> and the Ethiopians<WH3569> shall be at his steps.<WH4703>

But tidings<WH8052> out of the east<WH4217> and out of the north<WH6828> shall trouble<WH926> him: therefore he shall go<WH3318> forth<WH3318> with great<WH1419> fury<WH2534> to destroy,<WH8045> and utterly to make away<WH2763> many.<WH7227>

And he shall plant<WH5193> the tabernacles<WH168> of his palace<WH643> between<WH996> the seas<WH3220> in the glorious<WH6643> holy<WH6944> mountain;<WH2022> yet he shall come<WH935> to his end,<WH7093> and none<WH369> shall help<WH5826> him.
